title: I got banned for 2 weeks!??
body: I was playing my league game when I got a message that said I was banned for 2 weeks for being toxic. I'm not even toxic!!!! Is this a bug? Soemone helplpp D;

replies.body: Not seeing anything weird on your account.  Do you have a screenshot available of what you saw?  I'm curious if someone was just trying to play a prank on you.

Everyone in my friends list is doing this thing where they say System message: duo to the player behaviour system blah blah blah account has been banned for 2 weeks but they put a dot and a bunch of spaces so you can't see their name and looks like its legit because it's in yellow. Best way to check is to just hit /r and type something if it puts their user name in automatically you know it was them

> [{quoted}](name=420 Neal It,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7ajwGcMg,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-08-17T02:09:17.148+0000)
>
> Everyone in my friends list is doing this thing where they say System message: duo to the player behaviour system blah blah blah account has been banned for 2 weeks but they put a dot and a bunch of spaces so you can't see their name and looks like its legit because it's in yellow. Best way to check is to just hit /r and type something if it puts their user name in automatically you know it was them

Yeah, someone on my friend's list did the same thing to me. After the game though it showed up in my chat logs on the friend's list and that's when I realized it was fake. Not a nice thing to do to others, I was wondering what I did that would lead to a 2 week suspension for the rest of the game I was in when I got the message. Thought it was especially strange because I just got Honor 3 before I entered the match and then 3 minutes in I got a message saying I was suspended lol.
